name: Brodge: You only live once
description:
Brodge is a game based on jumping and ... jumping!

It is a calming and entertaining game, perfect to play for 10 minutes while you relax to its soundtrack

-How to play

To avoid losing you must collect the chocolatadas and thus increase your energy since if it reaches 0, you lose automatically, you must also avoid falling.

-Controls

Left = Long Jump (Use it to avoid falling off the cliffs)

Right = Short jump (Use it to grab the chocolatadas)

The menu is controlled with the mouse.

-Story

In Brodge you are Ricardo Tapia, an adventurer trying to climb the Aconcagua, unfortunately he is crossing a ghost bridge, it is infinite and there is no way to escape the bridge ... The only thing you can do is delay the death of Ricardo.

------------

Thanks for watching my game! I hope you enjoy

(If there is a misspelling, sorry, I really speak Spanish and I'm using a translator).

- Mate from Argentina
